data.name: User Experience (UX) Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's UX Center of Excellence delivers comprehensive user experience design and digital transformation services. The CoE focuses on human-centered design principles, creating intuitive and engaging digital experiences across web, mobile, and emerging platforms. With expertise in design thinking, user research, interface design, and usability testing, the UX CoE helps organizations improve customer satisfaction, increase conversion rates, and build products that users love.

services.name: Design Sprint Facilitation

data.businessValue: Accion's UX Center of Excellence delivers significant business value through improved user satisfaction (30-50% increase in NPS scores), higher conversion rates (20-40% improvement), reduced development costs through design systems (25-35% efficiency gains), decreased support tickets (40-60% reduction), and faster time-to-market with validated designs. The CoE enables organizations to create user-centered products that drive engagement, retention, and business growth.
